module.name: form_newsletter_subscription
module.description: Display and handle form for newsletter subscription and cancellation. Notes: - The default language is English. - You can use German translation. - Use the translation functionality to translate the module in other languages. Usage: - Create a template which includes this module and create an article using that template. - Configure category/arcticle specifying handler article id Based on the work of 4fb, www.x28.de, HerrB, 01.06.2007
